    • Constructor Detail

      • Hero

        public Hero(int id,
            java.lang.String type,
            java.lang.String name,
            int damage,
            int nbSummon,
            int idInvocation,
            int armorBuff,
            java.lang.String target,
            java.lang.String description)
        Initialize the attributes of this class.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the hero
        type - There are three types : mage, paladin, warrior
        name - the name of the hero
        damage - the amount of damage that the hero can inflict
        nbSummon - the amount of invocations that the hero can perfom
        idInvocation - the id of the hero's invocation
        armorBuff - the amount of armor buff that the hero can give
        target - a simple text with the target of the hero
        description - the description of the hero
